opening:
The unvierse is a wild, chaotic place.
Tyrannical empires, monstruous aliens, bloodthirst pirates, and the unforgiving vaccum make
everything dangerous, makes every day uncertain.
Out of the chaos, forged in fire and blood, heroes arise.
You? You are one of them, and could very well be the greatest of them all;
the true Defender of the Universe.
With a ship,a crew, your weapons and armor, and your own natural powers, you shall
save panets, overthrow dictators, defeat horrific monsters, holdback the tide of evil,
and bring peace and order to the universe.
You have 75 points.
Good luck, Hero.
